roleset.name: emphasize again

example.name: transitive
example.text: The statement re - emphasized that holders representing 75 % of the shares voting at a special shareholders ' meeting must agree to lift the takeover restrictions .

propbank.arg: holders representing 75 % of the shares voting at a special shareholders ' meeting must agree to lift the takeover restrictions

example.name: with hearer
example.text: Mary re - emphasized to John that he must never ever call her ' Snoogie - wookums ' in public .

propbank.arg: he must never ever call her ' Snoogie - wookums ' in public

roleset.note: REEMPHASIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 're-emphasize' based on transformation of frames for 'emphasize.' (from reemphasize.01-v predicate notes)
